tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE team_members (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE conflict_resolution (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
team_member_id INT,
date DATE NOT NULL,
resolution TEXT,
FOREIGN KEY (team_member_id) REFERENCES team_members(id));

CREATE TABLE team_members (
  member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  member_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  member_role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE conflicts (
  conflict_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  conflict_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  conflict_description TEXT,
  conflict_status ENUM('open', 'closed')
)

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
  resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resolution_conflict_id INT,
  resolution_description TEXT,
  resolution_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ConflictCases (
	case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	case_name VARCHAR(255),
	case_description TEXT,
	case_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE TeamMembers (
	member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	member_name VARCHAR(255),
	member_role VARCHAR(100),
	member_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE CaseAssignments (
	assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	case_id INT,
	member_id INT,
	assigned_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE TeamTasks (
	task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	task_description TEXT,
	task_status VARCHAR(50),
	assigned_to INT
)
